title: I think that Fiora's new  walking animation is a bit awkward.
body: seems like she is all hard and having troubles to move

replies.body: If anyone's walking animation needs fixed, it's Shen's.
Her stiff legs are a bit weird, but her floating for a second during her walking animation should be kept because it shows her style, light on her feet and swift.
Thats how i feel about GP's new walking animation. He literally looks like a Gangplank the prancing fairy pirate.
Her animation doesn't even change with increased or reduced MS.
She looks like she's spreading confetti everywhere.
I heard PBE is just for chilling out. So Fiora takes it chill.

She's prancing.

People do not prance at a leisurely pace.
I would have to agree, I find it`s also a bit jerky and disjointed.
